signature: public static Map<CharSequence, Integer> of(final CharSequence[] tokens)
name: of
javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a map where each key is a token from the input array and its corresponding value is the frequency of that token.
 *
 * @param tokens an array of CharSequence objects representing the tokens to be counted
 * @return a Map where each key is a token and its corresponding value is the frequency of that token
 */
improved_javadoc:
/**
 * Creates a map where each key is a token from the input array and its corresponding value is the frequency of that token.
 *
 * @param tokens an array of CharSequence objects representing the tokens to be counted, which may contain null values or empty strings
 * @return a Map where each key is a unique token and its corresponding value is the frequency of that token in the input array
 * @throws NullPointerException if the input array contains null elements
 */
